name: Data Extraction
Data Extraction
Intro
label: AgroSense is an integrated IoT-based smart farming system designed to monitor environmental conditions and automate irrigation processes, enabling farmers to remotely monitor and control their fields — including those located several kilometers away.
To build a scalable and intelligent farming solution that:
🟡 Collects real-time data from multiple environmental sensors
🟡 Provides cloud-based monitoring and control via a Node-RED dashboard
🟡 Bridges long distances using LoRa (Long Range) communication

name: Logo - Home
Logo - Control
Logo - History
Logo -Remote Farm
Logo - Remote Farm History
Home template
format:
<style>
  body {
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    background-color: #1a1b26 !important;
    color: #e8e8f2 !important;
  }

  md-card {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) !important;
  border-radius: 14px !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) !important;
  }

  .nr-dashboard-cardtitle,
  .nr-dashboard-template .title,
  .nr-dashboard-gauge .label,
  .nr-dashboard-gauge .value,
  .nr-dashboard-gauge .units {
    color: #e8e8f2 !important;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 16px;
  }

  .gauge-value {
    font-size: 22px !important;
    color: #7ed6df !important; /* soft teal */
  }

  .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
    background-color: #3c445c !important;
    color: #ffffff !important;
    border-radius: 12px !important;
    transition: background 0.3s ease;
  }

  .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
    background-color: #4b5169 !important;
  }

  .valve-on {
    animation: glow 1.5s infinite;
    background-color: #2ecc71 !important;
    color: #1a1a1a !important;
  }

  @keyframes glow {
    0% { box-shadow: 0 0 5px #2ecc71; }
    50% { box-shadow: 0 0 20px #2ecc71; }
    100% { box-shadow: 0 0 5px #2ecc71; }
  }

  /* Optional: rounded gauge ring */
  .nr-dashboard-gauge path {
    stroke-linecap: round !important;
  }

  /* Optional: wave fill styling */
  .nr-dashboard-gauge .wave {
    fill: #ffdd59 !important; /* warm lime */
  }

  .nr-dashboard-text {
    font-size: 16px !important;
    color: #ffffff !important;
  }

  /* Material icon tweak */
  .material-icons {
    vertical-align: middle;
    margin-right: 4px;
    color: #ffd369;
  }
</style>
